sentences: He was then a backing vocalist in the boy band, Big Fun, which was active between 1989 and 1994.

Creswick's later songwriting credits include: Family Fantastic's album Nice (2000, in collaboration with Jason Creasey and Vince Clarke) and the soundtrack to Winning London (2001, in collaboration with Nigel Lewis and Vince Clarke).
In September 2017, Creswick was charged with possession and supply of illegal drugs, and also with money laundering.
